classify_content.description: Assign categories to text or images using the Classifier API (zero-shot/few-shot).

props.name: model
props.description: The model to use for classification.

props.name: input
props.description: Text or image URL to classify. URLs will be treated as images, other strings as text.

props.name: labels
props.description: The labels to classify the content into.

deepsearch_query.description: Answer complex questions through iterative search, reading, and reasoning with the DeepSearch API.

props.name: reasoning_effort
props.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models. Reducing reasoning effort can result in faster responses and fewer tokens used on reasoning in a response.

props.name: budget_tokens
props.description: This determines the maximum number of tokens allowed for DeepSearch process. Larger budgets can improve response quality by enabling more exhaustive search for complex queries.

props.name: max_attempts
props.description: The maximum number of retries for solving a problem in DeepSearch process. A larger value allows DeepSearch to retry solving the problem by using different reasoning approaches and strategies.

props.name: no_direct_answer
props.description: Forces the model to take further thinking/search steps even when the query seems trivial. Useful if you're using DeepSearch in scenarios where you're certain the query always needs DeepSearch, rather than for trivial questions.

props.name: max_returned_urls
props.description: The maximum number of URLs to include in the final answer/chunk. URLs are sorted by relevance and other important factors.

props.name: response_format
props.description: JSON schema for structured output format. Example: { "type": "json_schema", "json_schema": { "type": "object", "properties": { "numerical_answer_only": { "type": "number" } } } }

props.name: boost_hostnames
props.description: A list of domains that are given a higher priority for content retrieval. Useful for domain-specific, high-quality sources that provide valuable content.

props.name: bad_hostnames
props.description: A list of domains to be strictly excluded from content retrieval. Typically used to filter out known spam, low-quality, or irrelevant websites.

props.name: only_hostnames
props.description: A list of domains to be exclusively included in content retrieval. All other domains will be ignored. Useful for domain-specific searches.

extract_webpage_content.description: Convert a URL into clean, LLM-friendly Markdown using the Reader API.

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the webpage to extract content from.

props.name: format
props.description: Format of the extracted content - how the webpage should be returned.

props.name: remove_all_images
props.description: Remove all images from the response.

props.name: links_summary
props.description: Create a "Buttons & Links" section at the end to help downstream LLMs or web agents navigate the page.

props.name: images_summary
props.description: Create an "Images" section at the end, giving downstream LLMs an overview of all visuals on the page.

props.name: do_not_track
props.description: When enabled, the requested URL won't be cached and tracked on our server.

props.name: iframe_extraction
props.description: Processes content from all embedded iframes in the DOM tree.

props.name: shadow_dom_extraction
props.description: Extracts content from all Shadow DOM roots in the document.

props.name: follow_redirect
props.description: Choose whether to resolve to the final destination URL after following all redirects. Enable to follow the full redirect chain.

props.name: eu_compliance
props.description: All infrastructure and data processing operations reside entirely within EU jurisdiction.

props.name: json_response
props.description: Return response in JSON format containing URL, title, content, and timestamp (if available).

props.name: timeout_seconds
props.description: Maximum page load wait time in seconds (0 means use default timeout, set a value if the default browser engine is too slow on simple webpages).

props.name: css_selector
props.description: List of CSS selectors to target specific page elements (e.g., "body, .main-content, #article").

props.name: wait_for_selector
props.description: CSS selectors to wait for before returning results (e.g., "#dynamic-content, .lazy-loaded").

props.name: exclude_selector
props.description: CSS selectors for elements to remove from the results (e.g., "header, footer, .ads, #sidebar").

train_custom_classifier.description: Fine-tune a classifier with labeled examples for domain-specific tasks.

props.name: model
props.description: The base model to use for training.

props.name: access
props.description: Visibility of the trained model.

props.name: num_iters
props.description: Number of training iterations to perform.

props.name: training_data
props.description: Type of input either text or image URL.

props.name: type
props.description: Type of input either text or image URL.

props.name: label
props.description: Label to associate with input.

web_search_summarization.description: Perform a web search and retrieve summarized results using the Reader API.

props.name: query
props.description: The search query to perform.

props.name: read_full_content
props.description: Visit every URL in the search result and return the full content using Reader. Toggle on to enable more Reader-specific options.

props.name: json_response
props.description: The response will be in JSON format, containing the URL, title, content, and timestamp (if available). In Search mode, it returns a list of five entries, each following the described JSON structure.

props.name: fetch_favicons
props.description: This will fetch the favicon of each URL in the SERP and include them in the response as image URI, useful for UI rendering.

props.name: preferred_country
props.description: The country to use for the search. It's a two-letter country code.

props.name: preferred_location
props.description: From where you want the search query to originate. It is recommended to specify location at the city level in order to simulate a real user's search.

props.name: preferred_language
props.description: The language to use for the search. It's a two-letter language code.

props.name: pagination
props.description: The result offset. It skips the given number of results. It's used for pagination.

props.name: in_site_search
props.description: Returns the search results only from the specified website or domain. By default it searches the entire web.

props.name: bypass_cached_content
props.description: Our API caches URL contents for a certain amount of time. Set it to true to ignore the cached result and fetch the content from the URL directly.

props.name: eu_compliance
props.description: All infrastructure and data processing operations reside entirely within EU jurisdiction.
